# max

**Instance Property**

The maximum encoded value.

## Declaration

```swift
var max: CGFloat
```

## Discussion

The vImage library clamps values greater than the maximum to the maximum.

## Instance properties

- **min**: The minimum encoded value.
- **zero**: The encoding for the value zero.
- **full**: The encoding for the value one.

items.description: The encoding for the value zero.
items.name: zero

items.description: The encoding for the value one.
